title: Introduction to Web Development
aboutCompany: Tech Academy is a leading online education platform specializing in tech-related courses.
aboutCourse: This course covers HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals for beginners.
Whocanapply: Anyone with basic computer skills and interest in web development
AdditionalInfo: Course materials will be provided. No prior coding experience required.

title: Data Science Bootcamp
aboutCompany: Data Masters has been training data professionals for over 10 years.
aboutCourse: Intensive 12-week program covering Python, SQL, and machine learning.
Whocanapply: STEM graduates or professionals with basic programming knowledge
AdditionalInfo: Laptops will be provided for in-person sessions. Evening classes available.

title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
aboutCompany: Marketing Pro offers cutting-edge digital marketing training since 2015.
aboutCourse: Learn SEO, social media marketing, and content strategy in 8 weeks.
Whocanapply: Marketing professionals or business owners looking to expand digital presence
AdditionalInfo: Weekly live Q&A sessions included. Self-paced learning available.

title: UX/UI Design Masterclass
aboutCompany: Design Hub is an award-winning design school with industry connections.
aboutCourse: Comprehensive training in user research, wireframing, and prototyping.
Whocanapply: Designers or developers looking to specialize in UX/UI
AdditionalInfo: Scholarships available for eligible candidates. Hybrid option (online/in-person).

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
aboutCompany: SecureNet trains the next generation of cybersecurity professionals.
aboutCourse: Foundational knowledge in network security, encryption, and ethical hacking.
Whocanapply: IT professionals or career changers interested in security
AdditionalInfo: Part-time and full-time tracks available. Prerequisites: basic networking knowledge.
